info.name: Old Youtube - Black & Green DestructiveBurn KMV
info.description:
Theme works for old-YouTube only.

My new Dark Theme;

https://userstyles.org/styles/174767/

Notice to Chrome users:
New CSS restrictions implemented could render this style unusable on Chrome.
If this problem occur, using Stylus will fix the issue;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

Other alternatives are;

-"ospery" (Chrome)
-"StylRRR or "Stylus" (Firefox).

https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Youtube Black & Green CSS3 V.1.0.3 for Mozilla Firefox

-Original, and with permission by:

-DestructiveBurn-


Based on the original theme:
"Youtube Black & Red (-DestructiveBurn-) V.18.2.5"

url: https://userstyles.org/styles/90834/

A modified version - only Green.


Fade-in animations of content, thumb-zoom, full screen player (in cinema-mode), and custom colors and gradient in player.


Changing video player to the HTML5 player is recommended:

http://www.youtube.com/html5

Contact;
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
info.additionalInfo:
Disable Adobe Shockwave Flash If you encounter issues.

Contact me on <reddit.com/r/KMV> for issues or comments.
Any help is appreciated.

** NOTE: Does not work on the newest visual update of YouTube **
    ----------
    2019 11 10 Changed Description for Chrome users.
    ----------
    2017 05 20 - Added filter for Youtube Privacy Reminder
    ----------
    2017 04 30 - Re-activated (new) wallpaper from dead url
    ----------
    v1.0.3 - 2016 11 25
    -Added custom Cursor
    ----------
    v1.0.2 - 2016 11 23
    -Added Green Time Remaining in Player Window including mnor background Glow.
    -Added Gradient Tickers in Player Settings.
    -Added dark hue to Volume Bar - there are now 2 hues + Gradient.
    -Fixed a Glitch with Autoplay Ticker above Playlist that turned Blue in v.1.0.1. 
    -Fixed Search Icon and Button Animation on User Channel Page.
    -Fixed Problem with Background on Main Page.
    -Changed Text Color in Video Description in User Page & on Subscription Buttons to a
     Lighter Gray for easier readability.
    -Added larger shadows on Main Buttons for smoother look.
    -Changed Visited Link Color to Light Green.
    url: https://www.mediafire.com/folder/dc4tbh8w77m3csa,mfxjc1d9bx12hfh/shared
    ----------
    v1.0.1 - 2016 11 22 - New Wallpaper, New Gradient Volume and Progress Bar, Green HD
    Emblem in Video Settings, Green Autoplay and Video Buttons and some minor tweaks of
    colours, Hues 'n Shadows.
    url: http://www.mediafire.com/file/dc4tbh8w77m3csa/v1.0.1._2016_11_22.txt
    ----------
    v.1.0.0 - First release can be accessed here: 
    http://www.mediafire.com/file/g2xqe240vv10l02/v.1.0.0.txt
